title: Where Did the Candies Go?
body:
I may be dreaming, but I faintly remember seeing there being snowdown sweets in the shop for 200 IP each.
I didn't buy any, and I was saving up till i had enough to buy sweets for redeeming for the Re-Gifted Amumu Icon in one sitting, and it isn't here anymore.
Will it be available again any time soon?
Was it just a one-day thing, or some event period I'm missing?

replies.body: Per the [Snowdown ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016)guide, snowdown sweets are available only on the weekends for IP.  Otherwise, they are also available through Snowdown Chests as well.  Enjoy the sugar!
